item.title: Anthropic Settles High-Profile AI Copyright Lawsuit Brought by Book Authors
item.description: Anthropic faced the prospect of more than $1 trillion in damages, a sum that could have threatened the company’s survival if the case went to trial.

item.title: Researchers Are Already Leaving Meta’s New Superintelligence Lab
item.description: CEO Mark Zuckerberg went on a recruiting blitz to lure top AI researchers to Meta. WIRED has confirmed that three recent hires have now resigned.
